title: 5.1 Master Challenge 3
question: Create a presentation with four slides. In the first slide add the title Animals. Add Types of animals as the subtitle. In the remaining slides, add images of animals that live on land, animals that live on water and animals that live on both land and water.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
